title: [娱乐][聊天]SmileyChat ———表情插件 让你的服务器有表情 [全版本]
author: junjun
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 07:06 编辑 

预览





Smileychat是一个简单的独立的插件
特色
●80+符号
论坛太坑爹了 不支持这些符号 只能用图片{:10_522:}

●15个可定制的笑脸符号!
●支持彩色！！！！！
●支持书
●支持告示牌
●1行代码 (╯°□°)╯︵┻━┻
指令

/ smileychat开启插件 或者用/ sc/ smileychat获得信息。/ smileychat重载重新加载配置。/ smileychat表情列表
坑爹的作者没写权限
不过开启权限只有OP有(其实是我没找到)
最后是下载地址
http://dev.bukkit.org/media/files/899/703/SmileyChat.jar

replies.author: 刀疯丶
replies.txt_content: 沙发是我的~你的标题有问题，赶快改吧~{:10_512:}不错的插件

replies.author: junjun
replies.txt_content:
1397209797 发表于 2015-10-5 17:53
沙发是我的~你的标题有问题，赶快改吧~不错的插件
怎么改QWQ 第一次发布插件QAQ

replies.author: junjun
replies.txt_content:
应该改完了
自己顶一下

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
All are default OPsmileychat.* all permissions.smileychat.update update notification on player join.smileychat.info acces to /smileychat command.smileychat.reload acces to /smileychat reload command.smileychat.list acces to /smileychat smileys command.smileychat.chat.*smileychat.chat.smileys use smileys in chat.smileychat.chat.custom use custom smileys in chat.smileychat.chat.art use ascii-art in chat.
smileychat.sign.*smileychat.sign.smileys use smileys on signs.smileychat.sign.custom use custom smileys on signs.smileychat.sign.art use ascii-art on signs.
smileychat.command.*smileychat.command.smileys use smileys in commands.smileychat.command.custom use custom smileys command.smileychat.command.art use ascii-art in commands.
smileychat.book.*smileychat.book.smileys use smileys in bookssmileychat.book.custom use custom smileys in bookssmileychat.book.art use art in books


以上权限，自行翻译
